descriptors.name: bt_soc_bthome_v2_scale
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - BTHome v2 - Scale
descriptors.description: This project illustrates how BTHome protocol can be effectively utilized with Silicon Labs devkits to communicate load cell sensor values to a HomeAssistant system.
